reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a high-quality piece with nice material and soft fabric, appreciating its rich brown color and rich color options.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: Great Quality. Sweater is a nice thick material. Soft and comfortable. Brown color is rich and chocolate brown Fits perfectly. The sleeves are a bit long, but cuffed, adds to its charm. Buttons are different shapes which adds interest. Great for work or outings. Might purchase in other colors if available. Read more
items.author: Colleen Dwight

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice
items.body: Truly a nice sweater to dress up or wear casually, very versatile. Great rich deep brown color, soft material and the cutest feature is each button is different. Fits true to size, I’m a medium. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Huskey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Daacee. sweater
items.body: Three stars. Nice sweater but it was very small due to it being a very tight knit with no give. Didn’t have to try it on you just knew. I ordered larger than normal which didn’t help. Also returned it immediately and had over $6.oo withheld from my refund with no explanation . I shall inquire about that Read more
items.author: dnhnck

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the office!
items.body: This sweater is lovely but not what I expected. The material was not as comfortable for what I wanted it for. It was too tight in the bust. Would definitely buy for the office . The quality was decent. Read more
items.author: Michelle LaTulipe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fabric, fabulous fit and fun buttons.
items.body: I love this sweater so much I order it in two more colors. A great fit and feels more expensive than is. The buttons are fabulous. My daughter nabbed my black one she liked it just as much as I did. Read more
items.author: Hldesign

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: Not true to size, size up. Buttons are cute but much bigger than in the picture, buttons gape so not for big chested women and shorter - front is almost cropped. Read more
items.author: Juan Gonzalez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m Guilty of Being Influenced
items.body: I saw this sweater on a shopping haul video and was immediately influenced. I would say that the top is *ever so slightly* bulky, so if you want a more fitted look, size down. I typically purchase XS tops, but I’m a 32E and didn’t want the space between the buttons to pucker so I bought a Small. Overall, the fit is a little big, but nothing that looks unflattering. This is definitely a unicorn find and something I would expect to see at Nordstrom for double the price. Zero regrets! Things I Knew I’d Love: - the mismatched buttons - the open bottom - the rich color options Things I Didn’t Expect to Love: - the buttons snap together (and it isn’t a flimsy, cheap snap that pops open) - the weaved fabric is soft, yet thick - the structure creates a polished, understated look Read more
items.author: Jennifer F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful statement piece
items.body: Im jumping on the bandwagon. This is a great sweater. It’s comfortable and soft and such a statement piece. So happy I got it! I’m a size xs - s and I got a small. Don’t worry if you think your stomach might show because unless you’re really tall I don’t think it will. It’s a great length. If you’re on the fence, jump over! Read more
items.author: Mgm

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Gray, Navy, Khaki, Beige, Burgundy, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
